bug.author: bultiful
bug.description: requests.exceptionsConnectionError: HTTPSConnectionPool...... Why not download the Chinese module, how to solve it? 为什么下载不了中文模块，怎么解决呢？

comments.comment: It seems users from China need to use VPN to download our models. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/stanfordnlp/stanza/issues/255#issuecomment-615345066>#255 (comment)</denchmark-link>

It seems users from China need to use VPN to download our models. #255 (comment)
